name: [(R) Netmiko Configuration and Validation Services] netmiko_check_vrf_test
creator: admin
description: Check that the vrf "test" is configured
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)

name: [(R) Scrapli and Netmiko Multiple Commands and Jinja2] Netmiko Jinja 2 conversion (text)
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
postprocessing:
is_string = isinstance(results["result"], str)
valid_commands = True
for vrf in ("a", "b", "c"):
  if f"show vrf {vrf}" not in results["commands"]:
    valid_commands = False
valid_content = results["result"].count("Interfaces") == 3
results["success"] = is_string and valid_commands and valid_content

name: [(R) Dry Run: Results modified in Postprocessing] Show Configuration
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
postprocessing:
if dry_run:
  results["result"] = "! Command: show running-config\ n! device: localhost (vEOS, EOS-4.23.1F)
!
! boot system flash:/vEOS-lab.swi\ n!
transceiver qsfp default-mode 4x10G
!
spanning-tree mode mstp
!
aaa authorization exec default local
!
no aaa root
!
username admin privilege 15 role network-admin secret sha512 $6$ShuyKzG/D1oOik78$rv5.M/fskKvrpPT9gntdwDlBSA9KUgsXhmjWTJZNobffvOK30/IpWhxVM7GEW6/Qtm1YUe2yvtLDgBLVvAb8R.\ nusername sammy privilege 15 secret sha512 $6$SNpEccP107A7vx7/$dPsdkT.dmBwwumIgqAjXE4zbAr16xf/mT18FYQtkQlNBm64mOfhBnWhU7uuJzxmagVxPX2NkdQRgNzMzNQbEl.\ nusername sammy ssh-key ssh-rsa  email@email.com
!
vrf instance napalm
!
vrf instance test
!
interface Loopback1
   ip address 1.1.1.1/32
!
interface Loopback2
   ip address 2.2.2.2/32
!
interface Loopback3
   ip address 3.3.3.3/32
!
interface Loopback4
!
interface Loopback5
!
interface Management1
   ip address 192.168.56.51/24
!
no ip routing
no ip routing vrf napalm
no ip routing vrf test
!
management api http-commands
   no shutdown
!
management api netconf
   transport ssh def
!
management telnet
   no shutdown
!
end"
